update.foreach: update graduate_exam_apply_examination_t set APPLY_STATUS_ = #{applyStatus} , ADUIT_OPINIONS_ =#{aduitOpinions} where ID_ = #{id}

mapper.select: select t1.STUDENT_CODE_ studentCode,t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ teachingClassId,t2.CODE_ teachingClassCode,t2.NAME_ teachingClassName from graduate_exam_apply_examination_t t1 left join teaching_class_t t2 on t2.ID_ = t1.TEACHING_CLASS_ID_ where t1.STUDENT_CODE_ = #{studentCode} and t1.EXAM_CALENDAR_ID_ = #{calendarId} and t1.COURSE_CODE_ = #{courseCode} and t1.APPLY_STATUS_ = 4
